<h3>ðŸš© Introduction</h3>

<p><b>Better Youtube Music</b> is a theme design for the YouTube music<br> website which is made similar to the Apple Music user interface<br>
 which was created using <b>
DOM manipulation</b> using <b>TapperMonkey</b></p>
<br>
    <a href="#getting-started">
        <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/downloads-2.8m%2B-brightgreen?style=for-the-badge&labelColor=141f17&color=2aa745&logo=data:image/png;base64," alt="downloads"/>
    </a>

        <img src="https://img.shields.io/github/license/zerodytrash/Simple-YouTube-Age-Restriction-Bypass?style=for-the-badge&labelColor=1b141f&color=9650b9&logo=data:image/png;base64," alt="license"/>
    </a>
</div>
<hr>

## How it works

This extension functions to change the appearance of YouTube Music to have a UI similar to Apple Music, and how does it work? so in this code you can manipulate objects/elements from the YouTube Music website and change them and add new code using the [DOM](https://www.w3schools.com/js/js_htmldom.asp) with [Tappermonkey](https://www.tampermonkey.net/) as a means to change the dom of the YouTube Music website itself

and boom the view from YouTube Music to Apple Music
